name: Sound of the Machine
description:
Sound of the machine is played with no visual input and with only one sound to guide you. In the main menu and the score screen you can also press enter to play(as opposed to clicking on the button).

The aim of the game is to collect as many machines as you can 
within the time limit. 

You start with 60 seconds.
Picking up a machine increases your time by 2 seconds. 

There is only ever one machine active at a time.

Use WASD to move.

The closer you are to the machine, the louder it is. 

The lower the pitch of the machine the closer you are 
to being on the same vertical level as the machine.

Use stereo sound to find it on a horizontal level.

Using headphones is strongly recommended.

Please give the game a few tries to get used to following the sound.
